channel.title: James Madison
channel.description:
This is the second part of the biography project I'm doing. I also did Samuel Adams, and I'm done with that.
~~~---James Madison (Same Questions)---~~~ -What were some obstacles for this person, but did not deter him? -Did this person experiance any tragedy in their life that made them want to participate in any war or social movement? -Choose one character trait you feel best describes this person and give one example from their life to support your choice. -Identify atleast one thing you find admirable/remarkable about this persons life. -Explain how this persons experiances influenced their choices regarding their life jobs held or participation in social movement. -Did this person do things that caused people to dislike or resent him of that people that caused peopel to find fault with this person? -What kind of work did this person do for the majority of their life? -Did this person work to improve conditions for others? (Give examples.)
~~~---Thanks Again---~~~ ~~~---NinjaSoD---~~~[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 03:23:06 PM[/size][hr]-.-

item.title: James Madison
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

This is the second part of the biography project I’m doing. I also did Samuel Adams, and I’m done with that.

~—James Madison (Same Questions)—~
-What were some obstacles for this person, but did not deter him?
-Did this person experiance any tragedy in their life that made them want to participate in any war or social movement?
-Choose one character trait you feel best describes this person and give one example from their life to support your choice.
-Identify atleast one thing you find admirable/remarkable about this persons life.
-Explain how this persons experiances influenced their choices regarding their life jobs held or participation in social movement.
-Did this person do things that caused people to dislike or resent him of that people that caused peopel to find fault with this person?
-What kind of work did this person do for the majority of their life?
-Did this person work to improve conditions for others? (Give examples.)

~—Thanks Again—~
~—NinjaSoD—~[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 03:23:06 PM[/size][hr]-.-
